MaterialityTopic.name: MaterialityTopic
MaterialityTopic.description: Represents a possible topic for materiality assessment.

Category.description: The category of the materiality assessment topic.

IsMaterial.description: Indicates whether the materiality topic warrants a report (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ParentTopicId.description: The parent materiality topic associated with the record.

SortOrder.description: The order in a sequence that the topic is sorted relative to other topics.
